00069 static bNodeSocket *cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, int UNUSED(pass), int rres_index)
00070 {
00071     bNodeSocket *sock;
00072     
00073     sock = node_add_output_from_template(ntree, node, &cmp_node_rlayers_out[rres_index]);
00074     /* for render pass outputs store the pass type index as a lookup key */
00075     sock->storage = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(rres_index);
00076     
00077     return sock;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static void cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_outputs(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, int passflag)
00081 {
00082     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_COMBINED) {
00083         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_COMBINED, RRES_OUT_IMAGE);
00084         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_COMBINED, RRES_OUT_ALPHA);
00085     }
00086     
00087     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_Z)
00088         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_Z, RRES_OUT_Z);
00089     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_NORMAL)
00090         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_NORMAL, RRES_OUT_NORMAL);
00091     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_VECTOR)
00092         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_VECTOR, RRES_OUT_VEC);
00093     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_UV)
00094         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_UV, RRES_OUT_UV);
00095     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_RGBA)
00096         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_RGBA, RRES_OUT_RGBA);
00097     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE)
00098         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE, RRES_OUT_DIFF);
00099     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_SPEC)
00100         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_SPEC, RRES_OUT_SPEC);
00101     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_SHADOW)
00102         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_SHADOW, RRES_OUT_SHADOW);
00103     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_AO)
00104         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_AO, RRES_OUT_AO);
00105     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_REFLECT)
00106         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_REFLECT, RRES_OUT_REFLECT);
00107     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_REFRACT)
00108         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_REFRACT, RRES_OUT_REFRACT);
00109     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_INDIRECT)
00110         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_INDIRECT, RRES_OUT_INDIRECT);
00111     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_INDEXOB)
00112         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_INDEXOB, RRES_OUT_INDEXOB);
00113     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_INDEXMA)
00114         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_INDEXMA, RRES_OUT_INDEXMA);
00115     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_MIST)
00116         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_MIST, RRES_OUT_MIST);
00117     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_EMIT)
00118         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_EMIT, RRES_OUT_EMIT);
00119     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT)
00120         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT, RRES_OUT_ENV);
00121     
00122     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT)
00123         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT, RRES_OUT_DIFF_DIRECT);
00124     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT)
00125         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT, RRES_OUT_DIFF_INDIRECT);
00126     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR)
00127         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR, RRES_OUT_DIFF_COLOR);
00128     
00129     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT)
00130         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT, RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_DIRECT);
00131     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT)
00132         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT, RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_INDIRECT);
00133     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR)
00134         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR, RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_COLOR);
00135     
00136     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_TRANSM_DIRECT)
00137         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_DIRECT, RRES_OUT_TRANSM_DIRECT);
00138     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_TRANSM_INDIRECT)
00139         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_INDIRECT, RRES_OUT_TRANSM_INDIRECT);
00140     if (passflag & SCE_PASS_TRANSM_COLOR)
00141         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_output(ntree, node, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_COLOR, RRES_OUT_TRANSM_COLOR);
00142 }

00144 static void cmp_node_image_add_multilayer_outputs(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, RenderLayer *rl)
00145 {
00146     bNodeSocket *sock;
00147     RenderPass *rpass;
00148     int index;
00149     for (rpass=rl->passes.first, index=0; rpass; rpass=rpass->next, ++index) {
00150         int type;
00151         if (rpass->channels == 1)
00152             type = SOCK_FLOAT;
00153         else
00154             type = SOCK_RGBA;
00155         
00156         sock = nodeAddSocket(ntree, node, SOCK_OUT, rpass->name, type);
00157         /* for multilayer image use pass index directly as key */
00158         sock->storage = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(index);
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 static void cmp_node_image_create_outputs(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node)
00163 {
00164     Image *ima= (Image *)node->id;
00165     if (ima) {
00166         ImageUser *iuser= node->storage;
00167         
00168         /* make sure ima->type is correct */
00169         BKE_image_get_ibuf(ima, iuser);
00170         
00171         if (ima->rr) {
00172             RenderLayer *rl= BLI_findlink(&ima->rr->layers, iuser->layer);
00173             
00174             if (rl) {
00175                 if (ima->type!=IMA_TYPE_MULTILAYER)
00176                     cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_outputs(ntree, node, rl->passflag);
00177                 else
00178                     cmp_node_image_add_multilayer_outputs(ntree, node, rl);
00179             }
00180             else
00181                 cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_outputs(ntree, node, RRES_OUT_IMAGE|RRES_OUT_ALPHA);
00182         }
00183         else
00184             cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_outputs(ntree, node, RRES_OUT_IMAGE|RRES_OUT_ALPHA|RRES_OUT_Z);
00185     }
00186     else
00187         cmp_node_image_add_render_pass_outputs(ntree, node, RRES_OUT_IMAGE|RRES_OUT_ALPHA);
00188 }
00189 
00190 static bNodeSocket *cmp_node_image_output_find_match(bNode *UNUSED(node), bNodeSocket *newsock, ListBase *oldsocklist)
00191 {
00192     bNodeSocket *sock;
00193     
00194     for (sock=oldsocklist->first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00195         if (strcmp(sock->name, newsock->name)==0)
00196             return sock;
00197     return NULL;
00198 }
00199 
00200 static bNodeSocket *cmp_node_image_output_relink(bNode *node, bNodeSocket *oldsock, int oldindex)
00201 {
00202     bNodeSocket *sock;
00203     
00204     /* first try to find matching socket name */
00205     for (sock=node->outputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00206         if (strcmp(sock->name, oldsock->name)==0)
00207             return sock;
00208     
00209     /* no matching name, simply link to same index */
00210     return BLI_findlink(&node->outputs, oldindex);
00211 }
00212 
00213 static void cmp_node_image_sync_output(bNode *UNUSED(node), bNodeSocket *UNUSED(newsock), bNodeSocket *UNUSED(oldsock))
00214 {
00215     /* pass */
00216 }
00217 
00218 /* XXX make this into a generic socket verification function for dynamic socket replacement (multilayer, groups, static templates) */
00219 static void cmp_node_image_verify_outputs(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node)
00220 {
00221     bNodeSocket *newsock, *oldsock, *oldsock_next;
00222     ListBase oldsocklist;
00223     int oldindex;
00224     bNodeLink *link;
00225     
00226     /* store current nodes in oldsocklist, then clear socket list */
00227     oldsocklist = node->outputs;
00228     node->outputs.first = node->outputs.last = NULL;
00229     
00230     /* XXX make callback */
00231     cmp_node_image_create_outputs(ntree, node);
00232     /* flag all new sockets as dynamic, to prevent removal by socket verification function */
00233     for (newsock=node->outputs.first; newsock; newsock=newsock->next)
00234         newsock->flag |= SOCK_DYNAMIC;
00235     
00236     for (newsock=node->outputs.first; newsock; newsock=newsock->next) {
00237         /* XXX make callback */
00238         oldsock = cmp_node_image_output_find_match(node, newsock, &oldsocklist);
00239         if (oldsock) {
00240             /* XXX make callback */
00241             cmp_node_image_sync_output(node, newsock, oldsock);
00242         }
00243     }
00244     
00245     /* move links to new socket */
00246     for (oldsock=oldsocklist.first, oldindex=0; oldsock; oldsock=oldsock->next, ++oldindex) {
00247         newsock = cmp_node_image_output_relink(node, oldsock, oldindex);
00248         
00249         if (newsock) {
00250             for (link=ntree->links.first; link; link=link->next) {
00251                 if (link->fromsock == oldsock)
00252                     link->fromsock = newsock;
00253             }
00254         }
00255     }
00256     
00257     /* delete old sockets
00258      * XXX oldsock is not actually in the node->outputs list any more,
00259      * but the nodeRemoveSocket function works anyway. In future this
00260      * should become part of the core code, so can take care of this behavior.
00261      */
00262     for (oldsock=oldsocklist.first; oldsock; oldsock=oldsock_next) {
00263         oldsock_next = oldsock->next;
00264         nodeRemoveSocket(ntree, node, oldsock);
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00268 static void cmp_node_image_update(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node)
00269 {
00270     /* avoid unnecessary updates, only changes to the image/image user data are of interest */
00271     if (node->update & NODE_UPDATE_ID)
00272         cmp_node_image_verify_outputs(ntree, node);
00273 }

00275 /* float buffer from the image with matching color management */
00276 float *node_composit_get_float_buffer(RenderData *rd, ImBuf *ibuf, int *alloc)
00277 {
00278     float *rect;
00279     int predivide= (ibuf->flags & IB_cm_predivide);
00280 
00281     *alloc= FALSE;
00282 
00283     if (rd->color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT) {
00284         if (ibuf->profile != IB_PROFILE_NONE) {
00285             rect= ibuf->rect_float;
00286         }
00287         else {
00288             rect= MEM_mapallocN(sizeof(float) * 4 * ibuf->x * ibuf->y, "node_composit_get_image");
00289 
00290             IMB_buffer_float_from_float(rect, ibuf->rect_float,
00291                 4, IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, predivide,
00292                 ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00293 
00294             *alloc= TRUE;
00295         }
00296     }
00297     else {
00298         if (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_NONE) {
00299             rect= ibuf->rect_float;
00300         }
00301         else {
00302             rect= MEM_mapallocN(sizeof(float) * 4 * ibuf->x * ibuf->y, "node_composit_get_image");
00303 
00304             IMB_buffer_float_from_float(rect, ibuf->rect_float,
00305                 4, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB, predivide,
00306                 ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00307 
00308             *alloc= TRUE;
00309         }
00310     }
00311 
00312     return rect;
00313 }
00314 
00315 /* note: this function is used for multilayer too, to ensure uniform 
00316    handling with BKE_image_get_ibuf() */
00317 static CompBuf *node_composit_get_image(RenderData *rd, Image *ima, ImageUser *iuser)
00318 {
00319     ImBuf *ibuf;
00320     CompBuf *stackbuf;
00321     int type;
00322 
00323     float *rect;
00324     int alloc= FALSE;
00325 
00326     ibuf= BKE_image_get_ibuf(ima, iuser);
00327     if (ibuf==NULL || (ibuf->rect==NULL && ibuf->rect_float==NULL)) {
00328         return NULL;
00329     }
00330 
00331     if (ibuf->rect_float == NULL) {
00332         IMB_float_from_rect(ibuf);
00333     }
00334 
00335     /* now we need a float buffer from the image with matching color management */
00336     /* XXX weak code, multilayer is excluded from this */
00337     if (ibuf->channels == 4 && ima->rr==NULL) {
00338         rect= node_composit_get_float_buffer(rd, ibuf, &alloc);
00339     }
00340     else {
00341         /* non-rgba passes can't use color profiles */
00342         rect= ibuf->rect_float;
00343     }
00344     /* done coercing into the correct color management */
00345 
00346 
00347     type= ibuf->channels;
00348     
00349     if (rd->scemode & R_COMP_CROP) {
00350         stackbuf= get_cropped_compbuf(&rd->disprect, rect, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, type);
00351         if (alloc)
00352             MEM_freeN(rect);
00353     }
00354     else {
00355         /* we put imbuf copy on stack, cbuf knows rect is from other ibuf when freed! */
00356         stackbuf= alloc_compbuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y, type, FALSE);
00357         stackbuf->rect= rect;
00358         stackbuf->malloc= alloc;
00359     }
00360     
00361     /*code to respect the premul flag of images; I'm
00362       not sure if this is a good idea for multilayer images,
00363       since it never worked before for them.
00364     if (type==CB_RGBA && ima->flag & IMA_DO_PREMUL) {
00365         //premul the image
00366         int i;
00367         float *pixel = stackbuf->rect;
00368         
00369         for (i=0; i<stackbuf->x*stackbuf->y; i++, pixel += 4) {
00370             pixel[0] *= pixel[3];
00371             pixel[1] *= pixel[3];
00372             pixel[2] *= pixel[3];
00373         }
00374     }
00375     */
00376     return stackbuf;
00377 }
00378 
00379 static CompBuf *node_composit_get_zimage(bNode *node, RenderData *rd)
00380 {
00381     ImBuf *ibuf= BKE_image_get_ibuf((Image *)node->id, node->storage);
00382     CompBuf *zbuf= NULL;
00383     
00384     if (ibuf && ibuf->zbuf_float) {
00385         if (rd->scemode & R_COMP_CROP) {
00386             zbuf= get_cropped_compbuf(&rd->disprect, ibuf->zbuf_float, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, CB_VAL);
00387         }
00388         else {
00389             zbuf= alloc_compbuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y, CB_VAL, 0);
00390             zbuf->rect= ibuf->zbuf_float;
00391         }
00392     }
00393     return zbuf;
00394 }
00395 
00396 /* check if layer is available, returns pass buffer */
00397 static CompBuf *compbuf_multilayer_get(RenderData *rd, RenderLayer *rl, Image *ima, ImageUser *iuser, int passindex)
00398 {
00399     RenderPass *rpass = BLI_findlink(&rl->passes, passindex);
00400     if (rpass) {
00401         CompBuf *cbuf;
00402         
00403         iuser->pass = passindex;
00404         BKE_image_multilayer_index(ima->rr, iuser);
00405         cbuf = node_composit_get_image(rd, ima, iuser);
00406         
00407         return cbuf;
00408     }
00409     return NULL;
00410 }
00411 
00412 static void node_composit_exec_image(void *data, bNode *node, bNodeStack **UNUSED(in), bNodeStack **out)
00413 {
00414     
00415     /* image assigned to output */
00416     /* stack order input sockets: col, alpha */
00417     if (node->id) {
00418         RenderData *rd= data;
00419         Image *ima= (Image *)node->id;
00420         ImageUser *iuser= (ImageUser *)node->storage;
00421         
00422         /* first set the right frame number in iuser */
00423         BKE_image_user_calc_frame(iuser, rd->cfra, 0);
00424         
00425         /* force a load, we assume iuser index will be set OK anyway */
00426         if (ima->type==IMA_TYPE_MULTILAYER)
00427             BKE_image_get_ibuf(ima, iuser);
00428         
00429         if (ima->type==IMA_TYPE_MULTILAYER && ima->rr) {
00430             RenderLayer *rl= BLI_findlink(&ima->rr->layers, iuser->layer);
00431             
00432             if (rl) {
00433                 bNodeSocket *sock;
00434                 int out_index;
00435                 CompBuf *combinedbuf= NULL, *firstbuf= NULL;
00436                 
00437                 for (sock=node->outputs.first, out_index=0; sock; sock=sock->next, ++out_index) {
00438                     int passindex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(sock->storage);
00439                     if (out[out_index]->hasoutput) {
00440                         CompBuf *stackbuf = out[out_index]->data = compbuf_multilayer_get(rd, rl, ima, iuser, passindex);
00441                         if (stackbuf) {
00442                             /* preview policy: take first 'Combined' pass if available,
00443                              * otherwise just use the first layer.
00444                              */
00445                             if (!firstbuf)
00446                                 firstbuf = stackbuf;
00447                             if (!combinedbuf &&
00448                                 (strcmp(sock->name, "Combined")==0 || strcmp(sock->name, "Image")==0))
00449                                 combinedbuf = stackbuf;
00450                         }
00451                     }
00452                 }
00453                 
00454                 /* preview */
00455                 if (combinedbuf)
00456                     generate_preview(data, node, combinedbuf);
00457                 else if (firstbuf)
00458                     generate_preview(data, node, firstbuf);
00459             }
00460         }
00461         else {
00462             CompBuf *stackbuf = node_composit_get_image(rd, ima, iuser);
00463             if (stackbuf) {
00464                 int num_outputs = BLI_countlist(&node->outputs);
00465                 
00466                 /*respect image premul option*/
00467                 if (stackbuf->type==CB_RGBA && ima->flag & IMA_DO_PREMUL) {
00468                     int i;
00469                     float *pixel;
00470             
00471                     /*first duplicate stackbuf->rect, since it's just a pointer
00472                       to the source imbuf, and we don't want to change that.*/
00473                     stackbuf->rect = MEM_dupallocN(stackbuf->rect);
00474                     
00475                     /* since stackbuf now has allocated memory, rather than just a pointer,
00476                      * mark it as allocated so it can be freed properly */
00477                     stackbuf->malloc=1;
00478                     
00479                     /*premul the image*/
00480                     pixel = stackbuf->rect;
00481                     for (i=0; i<stackbuf->x*stackbuf->y; i++, pixel += 4) {
00482                         pixel[0] *= pixel[3];
00483                         pixel[1] *= pixel[3];
00484                         pixel[2] *= pixel[3];
00485                     }
00486                 }
00487             
00488                 /* put image on stack */
00489                 if (num_outputs > 0)
00490                     out[0]->data= stackbuf;
00491                 
00492                 /* alpha output */
00493                 if (num_outputs > 1 && out[1]->hasoutput)
00494                     out[1]->data= valbuf_from_rgbabuf(stackbuf, CHAN_A);
00495                 
00496                 /* Z output */
00497                 if (num_outputs > 2 && out[2]->hasoutput)
00498                     out[2]->data= node_composit_get_zimage(node, rd);
00499                 
00500                 /* preview */
00501                 generate_preview(data, node, stackbuf);
00502             }
00503         }
00504     }   
00505 }
00506 
00507 static void node_composit_init_image(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode* node, bNodeTemplate *UNUSED(ntemp))
00508 {
00509     ImageUser *iuser= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ImageUser), "node image user");
00510     node->storage= iuser;
00511     iuser->frames= 1;
00512     iuser->sfra= 1;
00513     iuser->fie_ima= 2;
00514     iuser->ok= 1;
00515     
00516     /* setup initial outputs */
00517     cmp_node_image_verify_outputs(ntree, node);
00518 }
00519 
00520 void register_node_type_cmp_image(bNodeTreeType *ttype)
00521 {
00522     static bNodeType ntype;
00523 
00524     node_type_base(ttype, &ntype, CMP_NODE_IMAGE, "Image", NODE_CLASS_INPUT, NODE_PREVIEW|NODE_OPTIONS);
00525     node_type_size(&ntype, 120, 80, 300);
00526     node_type_init(&ntype, node_composit_init_image);
00527     node_type_storage(&ntype, "ImageUser", node_free_standard_storage, node_copy_standard_storage);
00528     node_type_update(&ntype, cmp_node_image_update, NULL);
00529     node_type_exec(&ntype, node_composit_exec_image);
00530 
00531     nodeRegisterType(ttype, &ntype);
00532 }
00533 
00534 
00535 /* **************** RENDER RESULT ******************** */
00536 
00537 static CompBuf *compbuf_from_pass(RenderData *rd, RenderLayer *rl, int rectx, int recty, int passcode)
00538 {
00539     float *fp= RE_RenderLayerGetPass(rl, passcode);
00540     if (fp) {
00541         CompBuf *buf;
00542         int buftype= CB_VEC3;
00543 
00544         if (ELEM4(passcode, SCE_PASS_Z, SCE_PASS_INDEXOB, SCE_PASS_MIST, SCE_PASS_INDEXMA))
00545             buftype= CB_VAL;
00546         else if (passcode==SCE_PASS_VECTOR)
00547             buftype= CB_VEC4;
00548         else if (ELEM(passcode, SCE_PASS_COMBINED, SCE_PASS_RGBA))
00549             buftype= CB_RGBA;
00550 
00551         if (rd->scemode & R_COMP_CROP)
00552             buf= get_cropped_compbuf(&rd->disprect, fp, rectx, recty, buftype);
00553         else {
00554             buf= alloc_compbuf(rectx, recty, buftype, 0);
00555             buf->rect= fp;
00556         }
00557         return buf;
00558     }
00559     return NULL;
00560 }
00561 
00562 static void node_composit_rlayers_out(RenderData *rd, RenderLayer *rl, bNodeStack **out, int rectx, int recty)
00563 {
00564     if (out[RRES_OUT_Z]->hasoutput)
00565         out[RRES_OUT_Z]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_Z);
00566     if (out[RRES_OUT_VEC]->hasoutput)
00567         out[RRES_OUT_VEC]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_VECTOR);
00568     if (out[RRES_OUT_NORMAL]->hasoutput)
00569         out[RRES_OUT_NORMAL]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_NORMAL);
00570     if (out[RRES_OUT_UV]->hasoutput)
00571         out[RRES_OUT_UV]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_UV);
00572 
00573     if (out[RRES_OUT_RGBA]->hasoutput)
00574         out[RRES_OUT_RGBA]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_RGBA);
00575     if (out[RRES_OUT_DIFF]->hasoutput)
00576         out[RRES_OUT_DIFF]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE);
00577     if (out[RRES_OUT_SPEC]->hasoutput)
00578         out[RRES_OUT_SPEC]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_SPEC);
00579     if (out[RRES_OUT_SHADOW]->hasoutput)
00580         out[RRES_OUT_SHADOW]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_SHADOW);
00581     if (out[RRES_OUT_AO]->hasoutput)
00582         out[RRES_OUT_AO]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_AO);
00583     if (out[RRES_OUT_REFLECT]->hasoutput)
00584         out[RRES_OUT_REFLECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_REFLECT);
00585     if (out[RRES_OUT_REFRACT]->hasoutput)
00586         out[RRES_OUT_REFRACT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_REFRACT);
00587     if (out[RRES_OUT_INDIRECT]->hasoutput)
00588         out[RRES_OUT_INDIRECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_INDIRECT);
00589     if (out[RRES_OUT_INDEXOB]->hasoutput)
00590         out[RRES_OUT_INDEXOB]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_INDEXOB);
00591     if (out[RRES_OUT_INDEXMA]->hasoutput)
00592         out[RRES_OUT_INDEXMA]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_INDEXMA);
00593     if (out[RRES_OUT_MIST]->hasoutput)
00594         out[RRES_OUT_MIST]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_MIST);
00595     if (out[RRES_OUT_EMIT]->hasoutput)
00596         out[RRES_OUT_EMIT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_EMIT);
00597     if (out[RRES_OUT_ENV]->hasoutput)
00598         out[RRES_OUT_ENV]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT);
00599     if (out[RRES_OUT_DIFF_DIRECT]->hasoutput)
00600         out[RRES_OUT_DIFF_DIRECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT);
00601     if (out[RRES_OUT_DIFF_INDIRECT]->hasoutput)
00602         out[RRES_OUT_DIFF_INDIRECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT);
00603     if (out[RRES_OUT_DIFF_COLOR]->hasoutput)
00604         out[RRES_OUT_DIFF_COLOR]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR);
00605     if (out[RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_DIRECT]->hasoutput)
00606         out[RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_DIRECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT);
00607     if (out[RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_INDIRECT]->hasoutput)
00608         out[RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_INDIRECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT);
00609     if (out[RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_COLOR]->hasoutput)
00610         out[RRES_OUT_GLOSSY_COLOR]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR);
00611     if (out[RRES_OUT_TRANSM_DIRECT]->hasoutput)
00612         out[RRES_OUT_TRANSM_DIRECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_DIRECT);
00613     if (out[RRES_OUT_TRANSM_INDIRECT]->hasoutput)
00614         out[RRES_OUT_TRANSM_INDIRECT]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_INDIRECT);
00615     if (out[RRES_OUT_TRANSM_COLOR]->hasoutput)
00616         out[RRES_OUT_TRANSM_COLOR]->data= compbuf_from_pass(rd, rl, rectx, recty, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_COLOR);
00617 }
00618 
00619 
00620 
00621 static void node_composit_exec_rlayers(void *data, bNode *node, bNodeStack **UNUSED(in), bNodeStack **out)
00622 {
00623     Scene *sce= (Scene *)node->id;
00624     Render *re= (sce)? RE_GetRender(sce->id.name): NULL;
00625     RenderData *rd= data;
00626     RenderResult *rr= NULL;
00627 
00628     if (re)
00629         rr= RE_AcquireResultRead(re);
00630 
00631     if (rr) {
00632         SceneRenderLayer *srl= BLI_findlink(&sce->r.layers, node->custom1);
00633         if (srl) {
00634             RenderLayer *rl= RE_GetRenderLayer(rr, srl->name);
00635             if (rl && rl->rectf) {
00636                 CompBuf *stackbuf;
00637 
00638                 /* we put render rect on stack, cbuf knows rect is from other ibuf when freed! */
00639                 if (rd->scemode & R_COMP_CROP)
00640                     stackbuf= get_cropped_compbuf(&rd->disprect, rl->rectf, rr->rectx, rr->recty, CB_RGBA);
00641                 else {
00642                     stackbuf= alloc_compbuf(rr->rectx, rr->recty, CB_RGBA, 0);
00643                     stackbuf->rect= rl->rectf;
00644                 }
00645                 if (stackbuf==NULL) {
00646                     printf("Error; Preview Panel in UV Window returns zero sized image\n");
00647                 }
00648                 else {
00649                     stackbuf->xof= rr->xof;
00650                     stackbuf->yof= rr->yof;
00651 
00652                     /* put on stack */
00653                     out[RRES_OUT_IMAGE]->data= stackbuf;
00654 
00655                     if (out[RRES_OUT_ALPHA]->hasoutput)
00656                         out[RRES_OUT_ALPHA]->data= valbuf_from_rgbabuf(stackbuf, CHAN_A);
00657 
00658                     node_composit_rlayers_out(rd, rl, out, rr->rectx, rr->recty);
00659 
00660                     generate_preview(data, node, stackbuf);
00661                 }
00662             }
00663         }
00664     }
00665 
00666     if (re)
00667         RE_ReleaseResult(re);
00668 }
00669 
00670 
00671 void register_node_type_cmp_rlayers(bNodeTreeType *ttype)
00672 {
00673     static bNodeType ntype;
00674 
00675     node_type_base(ttype, &ntype, CMP_NODE_R_LAYERS, "Render Layers", NODE_CLASS_INPUT, NODE_PREVIEW|NODE_OPTIONS);
00676     node_type_socket_templates(&ntype, NULL, cmp_node_rlayers_out);
00677     node_type_size(&ntype, 150, 100, 300);
00678     node_type_exec(&ntype, node_composit_exec_rlayers);
00679 
00680     nodeRegisterType(ttype, &ntype);
00681 }
